title: Android Demo - SpeechActivity - Fatal Exception
body_html:
Samsung Galaxy J1 - Android ver. 5.1.1

08-26 11:56:55.226: I/TensorFlowInferenceInterface(14094): Model load took 41ms, TensorFlow version: 1.3.0

Samsung Galaxy J1 - Android ver. 5.1.1
